name: Batch DSpace Installer
short_description:
The limiting factor to adopt DSpace has ever been the faced the difficulty in Installing and its command steps. And as we know that installation and configuration of the prerequisites that are usually time consuming and difficult with any operating system Linux, MAC or Window. This work has been meant for making DSpace a handy software and saving time of setting Environmental Variables, running window command line. Anyone with slightest knowledge of computer can also run DSpace with simple steps.
Here your DSpace Installer will work completely offline (NO need to get connected with internet)
summary: DSpace 4.1.2 Batch and Setup Installer OS: Window XP/7/8/Vista
